author: duftler
msg: The unmarshalling logic in Fault will now accept the SOAP-ENV namespace
uri in addition to the old accepted behavior of no namespace uri at all,

author: sanjiva
msg: removed trailing '/' in XSD and XSI namespace URIs

author: duftler
msg: If no port is specified, will now default to port 80. Thanks to
Steven J. McDowall for this work.
Submitted by:	Steven J. McDowall sjm@aptest.com

author: duftler
msg: Fixed a bug that occurred when a ServiceManagerClient was instantiated and
used to make several invocations. The problem was: when there were no
params, the params property of the Call object was not being set to null.
It was still pointing to whatever it pointed to from the previous call.
Thanks to Peter Brittenham for finding and fixing this bug.
